description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the Windows Cryptographic Services: 

1. Download and install the relevant KB updates for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system is restarted post-installation to enable the patch effects.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the information disclosure caused by the vulnerability CVE-2024-30016.
- Specific KB Articles to apply include:
  - KB5037788 for Windows 10 x64
  - KB5037771 for Windows 11 Version 23H2
  - KB5037770 for Windows 11 Version 21H2
  - KB5037768 for Windows 10 Version 22H2
- Update packages can be found at:
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the supported builds listed in the context, and backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
